name: verinode
description: Verinode - Web3 infrastructure for issuing and verifying cryptographic proofs on Stellar

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd contracts && cargo build && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.deploy:local: cd contracts && soroban contract deploy --network standalone
scripts.deploy:testnet: cd contracts && soroban contract deploy --network testnet
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend

author: Verinode Team
